title: Steak on the Stove
directions: Heat Oven to 500° with iron skillet inside.
Let steaks come to room temperature, rub with spices then coat with oil.
Cook each side of chops on a high stove top burner for 30 sec a side.
Flip chops and place them in oven and cook them 2 min a side.
If chops do not meet 130° internaly keep cooking them until they do at 2 min intervals.
Let chops cool down under foil for 3 min after temperature is reached.
